- International Conference on Tourism (ICOT2015) - London 24-27 June 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;5b6884bc.1503</link>   <description> From Tourism Policy into Practice<br>Issues and challenges in engaging policy makers and end users<br><br>London 24-27 June 2015<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01D0564B.545C5EA0]Following the success of the previous four International Conferences on Tourism (ICOT) and the support by the international scholarly community, the 5th ICOT conference will be held at the Department of Marketing, Branding and Tourism of Middlesex University, London, UK. The conference aims to add to the debate of tourism policies, to provide implications of policies and practical recommendations for end users including practitioners, policymakers, the industry and tourists, as well as to stimulate discussion and exchange of ideas between tourism [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T07:17:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kostas Andriotis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;5b6884bc.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;ac3a45a5.1502">   <title>New book information: Focus on Festivals: Contemporary European Case Studies and Perspectives </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;ac3a45a5.1502</link>   <description> Hello,<br>Please see below for details of an exciting new publication - Focus on<br>Festivals: Contemporary European Case Studies and Perspectives, edited<br>by Chris Newbold, Christopher Maughan, Jennie Jordan and Franco Bianchini .<br><br>Inspection copies are available to bona fide lecturers (see links below)<br>and educators will receive a 15% discount for direct (personal) orders<br>on published titles - simply enter the code FOF15 at checkout (valid<br>until 31.03.15). More information can be found through the links below<br>and on our website. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-24T12:16:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sally North</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;ac3a45a5.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;f37b494b.1502">   <title>24th Council for Hospitality Management Education (CHME) Annual Conference 20-22 May 2015 Final Call for Papers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;f37b494b.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Apologies for cross posting!<br><br>Thank you to everyone who has contacted us and submitted papers and<br>posters. This is a final gentle reminder that the deadline for submitting<br>papers is this *Friday the 27th of February*.<br><br>CALL FOR PAPERS<br><br>Council for Hospitality Management Education (CHME) Conference<br><br>20th - 22nd May 2015 Manchester, United Kingdom<br><br>www.chmemanchester.org<br><br>The conference will address the following themes: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-24T11:02:40+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Peter Lugosi</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;f37b494b.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;17ac9f1e.1502">   <title>24th Council for Hospitality Management Education (CHME) Annual Conference 20-22 May 2015 Call for Papers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;17ac9f1e.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Apologies for cross posting!<br><br>We have granted extensions to numerous authors, so it seemed sensible to<br>extend the deadline for other authors to *Friday the 27th of February*. We<br>have also added another exciting activity to the programme. Dr Eric Laurier<br>from the University of Edinburgh has done some superb work on hospitality<br>using observational and video techniques. He will be leading a dedicated<br>methods workshop as part of the CHME conference. Please see the final<br>programme for details. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-09T10:26:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Peter Lugosi</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;17ac9f1e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;b9bb7002.1501">   <title>Call for papers - International Conference on Tourism (ICOT2015) - London 24-27 June 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;b9bb7002.1501</link>   <description> From Tourism Policy into Practice<br>Issues and challenges in engaging policy makers and end users<br><br>London 24-27 June 2015<br><br>[cid:image002.jpg@01D03BD9.C4601E80]Following the success of the previous four International Conferences on Tourism (ICOT) and the support by the international scholarly community, the 5th ICOT conference will be held at the Department of Marketing, Branding and Tourism of Middlesex University, London, UK. The conference aims to add to the debate of tourism policies, to provide implications of policies and practical recommendations for end users including practitioners, policymakers, the industry and tourists, as well as to stimulate discussion and exchange of ideas between tourism [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-29T15:39:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kostas Andriotis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;b9bb7002.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;1f34cbc5.1501">   <title>Middlesex University - Public Seminar on Demographic Change and the Tourism Workforce by Prof. Tom Baum - London 30 Jan 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;1f34cbc5.1501</link>   <description> [cid:image001.jpg@01D02A50.60082080]<br>Tourism Policy Research Group Public Seminar<br><br>Department of Marketing, Branding and Tourism<br><br>Date: Friday 30th January, 2015<br><br>Time: 12.30pm (with lunch)<br><br>Venue: Committee Room 1, Hendon Town Hall (The Burroughs, Hendon, London, NW4 4BQ)<br><br>Chair: Sumeetra Ramakrishnan<br><br>The Tourism Policy Research Group (TPRG) invites you to this seminar to be delivered by Tom Baum, University of Strathclyde, UK. Hospitality Management*<br><br>The theme would particularly welcome submissions which explore<br>opportunities, issues and implications for the future of hospitality<br>management. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-12T14:40:02+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Peter Lugosi</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;ca996919.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;9ff99a4f.1501">   <title>FINAL CALL for AUTHORS - Travel and Tourism </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;9ff99a4f.1501</link>   <description> CALL FOR AUTHORS: *The SAGE International Encyclopedia of Travel and<br>Tourism*<br><br>We are inviting academic editorial contributors to *The SAGE International<br>Encyclopedia of Travel and Tourism.* In a multidisciplinary approach, this<br>encyclopedia examines the world travel and tourism industry, which is<br>expected to grow at an annual rate of four percent for the next 10 years.<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdOver 675 entries are organized A-Z across 4 volumes in the following<br>categories: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-09T09:54:55-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kara Ward</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;9ff99a4f.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;1d4b08fe.1501">   <title>Middlesex University - Public Seminar on Tourism imaginaries: What's in a name? by Prof. Noel B. Salazar, University of Leuven, Belgium. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-07T08:03:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kostas Andriotis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;1d4b08fe.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;a59e0b8b.1412">   <title>CALL FOR AUTHORS: The SAGE International Encyclopedia of Travel and Tourism </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;a59e0b8b.1412</link>   <description> CALL FOR AUTHORS: *The SAGE International Encyclopedia of Travel and<br>Tourism*<br><br>We are inviting academic editorial contributors to *The SAGE International<br>Encyclopedia of Travel and Tourism.* In a multidisciplinary approach, this<br>encyclopedia examines the world travel and tourism industry, which is<br>expected to grow at an annual rate of four percent for the next 10 years.<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdOver 675 entries are organized A-Z across 4 volumes in the following<br>categories: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-29T09:32:51-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kara Ward</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;a59e0b8b.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;f65e0a7.1412">   <title>Seasons Greetings (and a festive offer!) from Goodfellow Publishers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;f65e0a7.1412</link>   <description> Seasons Greetings from Goodfellow Publishers!<br><br>Tim and Sally at Goodfellow Publishers would like to wish you all a very<br>happy and healthy 2015!<br>To receive a festive 20% discount on ALL our products - simply enter the<br>code *SNOW2014* at checkout when buying direct from our site.<br>For our complete listing, and to receive your 20% discount, please visit<br>our website at www.goodfellowpublishers.com<br>&lt;http://www.goodfellowpublishers.com/&gt; for details. Offer valid until 05<br>Jan 2015*<br>Below are a few titles we hope are of interest to you. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T07:19:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kostas Andriotis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;67dab78a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;370324d.1411">   <title>Call for Authors: SAGE Encyclopedia of Travel and Tourism </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;370324d.1411</link>   <description> *Thank you for considering your contribution to this new, exciting<br>reference work!*<br><br>We are inviting academic editorial contributors to *The SAGE International<br>Encyclopedia of Travel and Tourism*. In a multidisciplinary approach, this<br>encyclopedia examines the world travel and tourism industry, which is<br>expected to grow at an annual rate of four percent in the next 10 years.<br>This rapidly expanding sector is seen in a variety of disciplines, from the<br>anthropology of tourism to the sociology of leisure to tourism<br>administration within business schools to urban studies programs. Moreover,<br>travel and tourism is now segmented into categories with disciplinary<br>foundations [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T10:38:49-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amy Jones</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HOSPITALITY-INDUSTRIES;370324d.1411</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
